name: Men's Core Essentials Stack

why_it_matters: A dependable daily stack helps remove guesswork and keeps your core nutrition routine simple.
includes: Simple routine fit for busy schedules

name: Women's Core Essentials Stack

why_it_matters: Consistent basics can help make long-term wellness habits easier to maintain.

name: Sleep Stack
short_description: Evening support to help you build a calm, repeatable wind-down routine.
why_it_matters: A clear nighttime routine can make it easier to stay consistent with recovery habits.

name: Gut Stack
short_description: A simple daily approach to digestive and microbiome support.
why_it_matters: Digestive consistency often starts with a focused routine and clear product selection.

name: Performance Stack
short_description: Daily support for training days, output, and recovery rhythm.

name: Stress + Recovery Stack
short_description: Targeted support for calm focus and day-to-day balance.

name: Immunity Stack
short_description: Core daily support to help you stay ready year-round.
why_it_matters: Immunity routines work best when they are simple enough to maintain over time.

name: Energy + Focus Stack
short_description: Clean daily support for productivity, clarity, and momentum.

name: Beauty / Glow Stack

name: Joint + Mobility Stack
